name: Partyboy
description: A GameBoy Color emulator, the successor to frosty. Supports many cool features such as save states and being able to run in the browser.

name: Frosty
description: Creating an accurate, maintainable Game Boy emulator written in the rust programming language.

name: Chip 8
description: My first ever emulator project. Served as a gentle introduction some basic concepts, as well as a cool little project.
